title: Granite countertops, Microwave, Dry sauna
neighborhood: 3205 Los Feliz Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: Discover a peaceful oasis with a playful ‘50s vibe at Rancho Los Feliz, in Los Angeles, California.

Surrounded by lush foliage and mature trees, our stylish studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartment homes blend comfort and convenience to create an ideal urban retreat worthy of Frank Sinatra or Doris Day.
From the heated resort-style swimming pool to the rejuvenating sauna, our nifty amenities allow you to live every day like you’re on vacation.
A one-of-a-kind community is waiting for you at Rancho Los Feliz.
Come see us today (poodle skirt or letter jacket optional).

View the splendors of the night sky and reminisce about the space race from Griffith Observatory, get a close-up view of the flora and fauna at Los Angeles Zoo and Botanical Gardens, hike the extensive trail system for panoramic views of Los Angeles.
Click through our photo gallery and flip your lid when you see the life that awaits you at Rancho Los Feliz.
Our stylish homes offer a peaceful, inviting atmosphere in an idyllic setting with a touch of mid-century modern flair.- Microwave- Granite countertops-
Stellar onsite management available 7 days a week- Clubhouse lounge with complimentary coffee & WiFi- Oversized mirrored wardrobe- Gas range-
For more information, visit us at: <URL> is subject to change.
